file_content.text: Soon as we get extracted, I'll get some friendlies into that arms factory.
The weapons facility is clear. The Drall won't be distributing arms to anyone.
I took care of the Drall.
You boys see that? That's how professionals get things done.
Command will get that factory under Imperial control in no time.
The Drall will think twice before crossing the Empire again.
They'll remember this defeat.
We can always hope. We'll get another walker and get back to the fight.
What can I say? I'm good.
Hey, when you got it, you got it. Good luck to you.
Yeah, whatever. We done now?
Yes, of course. Sorry to hold you up.
We've gotta take back that arms factory before the Drall can hand over those weapons.
My lord! Watch your step--this whole area's a hot zone.
Agent--watch where you step.
Watch yourself, hunter. I don't know how much of this zone's rigged.
Looks like you wandered into the same hot zone we did.
We were running down a bunch of filthy Drall when we hit one of their mines. Put most of my guys out of commission.
A true soldier fights on despite adversity.
Warriors do not accept defeat.
Yes, my lord. Perhaps you can help me with that.
What exactly are you doing out here, Lieutenant?
Please--elaborate.
Sounds like you could use a hand. Fortunately, I'm available... for a price.
Looks like you need some help.
It's embarrassing, but I could use the help.
What's your objective, lieutenant?
Brief me on the operation.
Exterminating a pack of Drall. Or, trying to.
What exactly is a Drall?
Drall?
Furry aliens; mostly live in the Corellian system. Disgusting little rodents.
But somehow they took over an arms factory that's loaded with blasters and mines.
Doesn't make you look good, does it? Your whole unit disabled....
Pretty humiliating.
Most embarrassing moment of my career.
The Drall may be a bunch of alien furballs, but they captured an arms factory crammed full of blasters and mines.
They'll ship those weapons from the arms factory to the rebels unless we stop them. And if you hadn't noticed... we're not going anywhere.
Those weapons can't fall into rebel hands. What were your plans?
I'll take care of it.
Take back that factory--root out every one of those overgrown weasels. Then we'll keep control of those weapons.
This is a serious threat. Aren't reinforcements available?
Surely you have backup.
I called it in, but there's no time. A comlink intercept says they're planning to hand over the weapons any time now.
Why should I care?
I don't know about you, but the thought of the occupation getting compromised by a bunch of overgrown weasels makes me sick.
If all that firepower ends up in rebel hands, we're looking at a major threat to Imperial forces on Corellia. If you can't take that factory, I don't know who will.
Those weapons will never pass into enemy hands.
I will secure the factory.
Allies of the Republic and a factory full of arms make for an unsavory pairing. Consider it done.
I will secure the factory.
Thank you, my lord.
I can do it--but I didn't build this rep by doing charity work.
Sure, if you can afford me.
I figured. I'll give you whatever I can spare.
That factory will be back in Imperial hands in no time.
My kind of operation.
I've gotta work with you intel-types more often.
I will crush these vermin.
The filthy creatures will die.
Wish I could be there for that.
Just watch your step. They're putting their new mines to good use.
[Refuse Quest] No.
Well... I guess we'll just have to hope the reinforcements can get there in time.
We've got a lot of wounded here. We're waiting for medevac.
